description: By providing the ARN (Amazon Resource Name), this API returns the virtual machine.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: VirtualMachine
nested_items.description: This object contains the basic attributes of VirtualMachine contained by the output of GetVirtualMachine.

nested_items.name: HostName
nested_items.description: The host name of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: HypervisorId
nested_items.description: The ID of the virtual machine's hypervisor.

nested_items.name: LastBackupDate
nested_items.description: The most recent date a virtual machine was backed up, in Unix format and UTC time.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: Path
nested_items.description: The path of the virtual machine.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the virtual machine. For example, arn:aws:backup-gateway:us-west-1:0000000000000:vm/vm-0000ABCDEFGIJKL.

nested_items.name: VmwareTags
nested_items.description: These are the details of the VMware tags associated with the specified virtual machine.

nested_items.name: VmwareCategory
nested_items.description: The is the category of VMware.

nested_items.name: VmwareTagDescription
nested_items.description: This is a user-defined description of a VMware tag.

nested_items.name: VmwareTagName
nested_items.description: This is the user-defined name of a VMware tag.
